name: QrPngCanvasEdgePatternOptions
summary: Edge pattern options for frames and badges.

properties.name: SpacingPx
properties.summary: Spacing between pattern elements in pixels.

properties.name: DashPx
properties.summary: Dash length in pixels (used by dashes/stitches).

properties.name: InsetPx
properties.summary: Inset from the outer edge in pixels.
